entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 12:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
